house_listing.house_description: Stunning design & quality constructed by award winning builder. Ranch style offers convenient & gracious lifestyle. Open foyer ceramic/hardwood; study/den; 2 car garage; family rm w/vaulted ceiling, fireplace w/marble surrounds & mantle; buyers to select custom features to suit their needs/wants.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Contemporary Style, Foyer, Office, Pantry,Ranch Style, Walk-In Closet(s)
